ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella.....

*Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no.....=
.I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella...=
.. *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a=
 Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb =
and mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the ground shiver=
ing from how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesda=
y, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Train Wreck walked =
away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seei=
ng any point in continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed=
 with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as =
well.

  "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamro=
ck said.

  "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out t=
o grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

  "We left that idiot A=
rrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

  "WHAT!?" Stranato =
yelled.

  "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so =
are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

  The Radicons nodded an=
d walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that none of them, could under=
stand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The People's Base's secret pa=
ssageway was in the nearby swamp.

  "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbo=
mber.

  "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

  "Never mind him." Train=
 Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come=
 along while he walked with his comrades.

  Dracona was getting furious, a=
nd so was Gangon.

  "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade wi=
ll still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew aw=
ay.

  "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

  Dracona=
 didn't hear and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, P=
lintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the sec=
ret passage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and A=
irbomber stepped into a door.

  "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing=
!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.=


  "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enou=
gh to put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room bef=
ore?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender=
 followed.

  "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plin=
tissa sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicon=
s were locked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of=
 banging, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa l=
aughed and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

  "Oh, man! Not=
 even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold s=
aid.

  "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

  "I ha=
ve more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need=
 to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

  "How come we can't all get along! I don'=
t like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was =
going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

  "You see? That's why you=
 fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! Thi=
s was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

  "Yeah, and nobody is getting out of=
 here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

  Stranato sighed i=
n disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and started pacing the room. Strongh=
old and Blender started to look in cracks in the wall for something to drin=
k, despite plenty of water in this room. Train Wreck was discussing somethi=
ng with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blender joined them before =
long.

  "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do=
, and--"

  "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!=
" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them.=
 Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

  Plintissa and Dracona smi=
le to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk=
 across a field...

-------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------

------------------------------
